name: MSCRMPackCMData
description: Packs the data files that have been extracted using Extract task back into a data zip that can be imported using Configuration Migration Tool
author: Wael Hamze
helpMarkDown: More information on Configuration Migration Tools can be found [here](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-platform/admin/manage-configuration-data)

inputs.name: dataFile
inputs.label: Data File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The absolute path to data zip file that will be generated from the extract folder

inputs.name: extractFolder
inputs.label: Extract Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The absolute path to the folder containing the extracted data files

inputs.name: combineDataXmlFile
inputs.label: Combine Data Xml
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to combine multiple entity data xml files into single data.xml file
